DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Ankle Dorsiflexion Dynasplint System ( DS ) effective treating contracture patient Ankle Equinus secondary diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Ankle Equinus Contracture Treated With Dynamic Splinting
DOC.criteria: Previous Diagnosis Diabetes Mellitus Reduced flexibility AROM extension ankle Less 10ยบ Maximal , Active Dorsiflexion , upright Impaired gait pattern Previous surgical treatment pathology Previous surgery Achilles tendon triceps surae Current treatment corticosteroid Current treatment Botulinium ToxinA ( Botox ) , low extremity Current treatment Fluoroquinolones ( antibiotic medication ) Current use muscle relaxant medication Fibromyalgia Stroke , CVA , Brain Injury , Spinal Cord Injury , neural pathology cause plasticity hypertonicity Current participation manual , physical therapy Treatment electrical stimulation assist ambulation ( i.e . Bioness , WalkAide , Parastep , etc . ) Preexisting open sore foot leg
